title: Technology Self-Efficacy Enhancement Program for Improving Online Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic online learning tools (Zoom, etc.)
context.additional_context: Short-term online course for strengthening job competencies in science fields

learning_goals: Learners can improve self-efficacy in using online learning tools by over 80%
Learners perceive the usefulness and ease of use of online learning systems at 4 or higher on a 5-point scale
Learners apply at least three self-directed learning strategies in online learning environments
Learners improve learning effectiveness by over 20% based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
